snippet: His academic eligibility restored, James Southerland helped No. 9 Syracuse defeat St. John’s, which was missing Coach Steve Lavin.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Syracuse defeats St John's, 77-58; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: His academic eligibility restored, James Southerland helped No. 9 Syracuse defeat St. John’s, which was missing Coach Steve Lavin.

headline.seo: With Steve Lavin Out, St. John’s Loses to Syracuse
headline.main: Getting Key Player Back, Syracuse Beats St. John’s
headline.print_headline: Getting Key Player Back, Syracuse Beats St. John’s
